author: Brandjuh
description: Building request system with location parsing, geocoding, admin approval workflow, and comprehensive statistics tracking. Supports Google Maps links, coordinate extraction, and automatic address lookup.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing BuildingManager! üè¢

**Quick Setup:**
1. `[p]buildset requestchannel #channel` - Where users request
2. `[p]buildset adminchannel #channel` - Where admins review
3. `[p]buildset logchannel #channel` - Where actions log
4. `[p]buildset adminrole @role` - Who can approve/deny
5. `[p]buildset post` - Post the request button

**Optional:**
‚Ä¢ `[p]buildset googlekey <key>` - Add Google Geocoding API
‚Ä¢ `[p]buildset buttonmessage <text>` - Custom button text

**Features:**
‚úÖ Google Maps link parsing & coordinate extraction
‚úÖ Automatic address geocoding (Nominatim + Google)
‚úÖ Edit requests before submission
‚úÖ Admin approval workflow with preset denial reasons
‚úÖ Comprehensive statistics tracking
‚úÖ SQLite database storage

**Commands:**
‚Ä¢ `[p]buildstats` - View statistics
‚Ä¢ `[p]help BuildingManager` - Full command list

Need help? Check the README on GitHub!
short: Building request system with location parsing and statistics
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs, usernames, and building request data in a SQLite database for statistics and logging purposes. No other personal data is stored.
